The word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came again unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, say<S>559</S> unto the prince<S>5057</S> of Tyrus<S>6865</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because thine heart<S>3820</S> is lifted up<S>1361</S>, and thou hast said<S>559</S>, I am a God<S>410</S>, I sit<S>3427</S> in the seat<S>4186</S> of God<S>430</S>, in the midst<S>3820</S> of the seas<S>3220</S>; yet thou art a man<S>120</S>, and not God<S>410</S>, though thou set<S>5414</S> thine heart<S>3820</S> as the heart<S>3820</S> of God<S>430</S>: <sup>midst: Heb. heart</sup>
Behold, thou art wiser<S>2450</S> than Daniel<S>1840</S>; there is no secret<S>5640</S> that they can hide<S>6004</S> from thee:
With thy wisdom<S>2451</S> and with thine understanding<S>8394</S> thou hast gotten<S>6213</S> thee riches<S>2428</S>, and hast gotten<S>6213</S> gold<S>2091</S> and silver<S>3701</S> into thy treasures<S>214</S>:
By thy great<S>7230</S> wisdom<S>2451</S> and by thy traffick<S>7404</S> hast thou increased<S>7235</S> thy riches<S>2428</S>, and thine heart<S>3824</S> is lifted up<S>1361</S> because of thy riches<S>2428</S>: <sup>thy great: Heb. the greatness of thy wisdom</sup>
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because thou hast set<S>5414</S> thine heart<S>3820</S> as the heart<S>3824</S> of God<S>430</S>;
Behold, therefore I will bring<S>935</S> strangers<S>2114</S> upon thee, the terrible<S>6184</S> of the nations<S>1471</S>: and they shall draw<S>7324</S> their swords<S>2719</S> against the beauty<S>3308</S> of thy wisdom<S>2451</S>, and they shall defile<S>2490</S> thy brightness<S>3314</S>.
They shall bring thee down<S>3381</S> to the pit<S>7845</S>, and thou shalt die<S>4191</S> the deaths<S>4463</S> of them that are slain<S>2491</S> in the midst<S>3820</S> of the seas<S>3220</S>.
Wilt thou yet<S>559</S> say<S>559</S> before<S>6440</S> him that slayeth<S>2026</S> thee, I am God<S>430</S>? but thou shalt be a man<S>120</S>, and no God<S>410</S>, in the hand<S>3027</S> of him that slayeth<S>2490</S> thee. <sup>of him that slayeth: or, of him that woundeth</sup>
Thou shalt die<S>4191</S> the deaths<S>4194</S> of the uncircumcised<S>6189</S> by the hand<S>3027</S> of strangers<S>2114</S>: for I have spoken<S>1696</S> it, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
Moreover the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, take up<S>5375</S> a lamentation<S>7015</S> upon the king<S>4428</S> of Tyrus<S>6865</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto him, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Thou sealest up<S>2856</S> the sum<S>8508</S>, full<S>4392</S> of wisdom<S>2451</S>, and perfect<S>3632</S> in beauty<S>3308</S>.
Thou hast been in Eden<S>5731</S> the garden<S>1588</S> of God<S>430</S>; every precious<S>3368</S> stone<S>68</S> was thy covering<S>4540</S>, the sardius<S>124</S>, topaz<S>6357</S>, and the diamond<S>3095</S>, the beryl<S>8658</S>, the onyx<S>7718</S>, and the jasper<S>3471</S>, the sapphire<S>5601</S>, the emerald<S>5306</S>, and the carbuncle<S>1304</S>, and gold<S>2091</S>: the workmanship<S>4399</S> of thy tabrets<S>8596</S> and of thy pipes<S>5345</S> was prepared<S>3559</S> in thee in the day<S>3117</S> that thou wast created<S>1254</S>. <sup>sardius: or, ruby</sup> <sup>beryl: or, chrysolite</sup> <sup>emerald: or, chrysoprase</sup>
Thou art the anointed<S>4473</S> cherub<S>3742</S> that covereth<S>5526</S>; and I have set<S>5414</S> thee so: thou wast upon the holy<S>6944</S> mountain<S>2022</S> of God<S>430</S>; thou hast walked up and down<S>1980</S> in the midst<S>8432</S> of the stones<S>68</S> of fire<S>784</S>.
Thou wast perfect<S>8549</S> in thy ways<S>1870</S> from the day<S>3117</S> that thou wast created<S>1254</S>, till iniquity<S>5766</S> was found<S>4672</S> in thee.
By the multitude<S>7230</S> of thy merchandise<S>7404</S> they have filled<S>4390</S> the midst<S>8432</S> of thee with violence<S>2555</S>, and thou hast sinned<S>2398</S>: therefore I will cast thee as profane<S>2490</S> out of the mountain<S>2022</S> of God<S>430</S>: and I will destroy<S>6</S> thee, O covering<S>5526</S> cherub<S>3742</S>, from the midst<S>8432</S> of the stones<S>68</S> of fire<S>784</S>.
Thine heart<S>3820</S> was lifted up<S>1361</S> because of thy beauty<S>3308</S>, thou hast corrupted<S>7843</S> thy wisdom<S>2451</S> by reason of<S>5921</S> thy brightness<S>3314</S>: I will cast<S>7993</S> thee to the ground<S>776</S>, I will lay<S>5414</S> thee before<S>6440</S> kings<S>4428</S>, that they may behold<S>7200</S> thee.
Thou hast defiled<S>2490</S> thy sanctuaries<S>4720</S> by the multitude<S>7230</S> of thine iniquities<S>5771</S>, by the iniquity<S>5766</S> of thy traffick<S>7404</S>; therefore will I bring forth<S>3318</S> a fire<S>784</S> from the midst<S>8432</S> of thee, it shall devour<S>398</S> thee, and I will bring<S>5414</S> thee to ashes<S>665</S> upon the earth<S>776</S> in the sight<S>5869</S> of all them that behold<S>7200</S> thee.
All they that know<S>3045</S> thee among the people<S>5971</S> shall be astonished<S>8074</S> at thee: thou shalt be a terror<S>1091</S>, and never<S>369</S> shalt thou be any more<S>5704</S> <S>5769</S>. <sup>a terror: Heb. terrors</sup>
Again the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, set<S>7760</S> thy face<S>6440</S> against Zidon<S>6721</S>, and prophesy<S>5012</S> against it,
And say<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Behold, I am against thee, O Zidon<S>6721</S>; and I will be glorified<S>3513</S> in the midst<S>8432</S> of thee: and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>, when I shall have executed<S>6213</S> judgments<S>8201</S> in her, and shall be sanctified<S>6942</S> in her.
For I will send<S>7971</S> into her pestilence<S>1698</S>, and blood<S>1818</S> into her streets<S>2351</S>; and the wounded<S>2491</S> shall be judged<S>5307</S> in the midst<S>8432</S> of her by the sword<S>2719</S> upon her on every side<S>5439</S>; and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And there shall be no more a pricking<S>3992</S> brier<S>5544</S> unto the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, nor any grieving<S>3510</S> thorn<S>6975</S> of all that are round about<S>5439</S> them, that despised<S>7590</S> them; and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; When I shall have gathered<S>6908</S> the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> from the people<S>5971</S> among whom they are scattered<S>6327</S>, and shall be sanctified<S>6942</S> in them in the sight<S>5869</S> of the heathen<S>1471</S>, then shall they dwell<S>3427</S> in their land<S>127</S> that I have given<S>5414</S> to my servant<S>5650</S> Jacob<S>3290</S>.
And they shall dwell<S>3427</S> safely<S>983</S> therein, and shall build<S>1129</S> houses<S>1004</S>, and plant<S>5193</S> vineyards<S>3754</S>; yea, they shall dwell<S>3427</S> with confidence<S>983</S>, when I have executed<S>6213</S> judgments<S>8201</S> upon all those that despise<S>7590</S> them round about<S>5439</S> them; and they shall know<S>3045</S> that I am the LORD<S>3068</S> their God<S>430</S>. <sup>safely: or, with confidence</sup> <sup>despise: or, spoil</sup>
